<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
DEALS
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/07/29/london-stock-talks-buy-refinitiv?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
It's All Refinitiv
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The London Stock Exchange (LSE, but not the one where your econ major friends studied one summer in college) confirmed it’s in <a href="https://www.ft.com/content/ddf40314-afc6-11e9-8030-530adfa879c2?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">advanced talks</a> to buy Refinitiv in a $27 billion <a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2019-07-26/lse-is-discussing-combination-with-data-firm-refinitiv-ft-says?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">deal</a>.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Refinitiv, which is majority-owned by a consortium including U.S. private equity giant Blackstone, provides companies with global financial data analytics. That's a fancy British way of saying it sends 40,000+ traders and investors the pre-crunched numbers they need to do their jobs. Looking for a <GO> button? Refinitiv’s Eikon terminals are the main alternative to Bloomberg Terminals on most trading floors.</p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">The LSE knows data wins arguments</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">It might have earned its reputation running stock exchanges and clearing derivatives, but the LSE has large-scale <a href="https://www.reuters.com/article/us-refinitiv-m-a-lse-exchange-analysis/lses-bid-for-refinitiv-spotlights-quest-for-data-globality-idUSKCN1UN048?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">data ambitions</a>, too.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Already, it runs Mergent, a private company information service; XTF, an information service for exchange-traded funds; and The Yield Book, a fixed-income indexing service. Adding Refinitiv to the roster gives the LSE firmer data footing while diversifying its revenue streams.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Refinitiv was valued at $20 billion last year.</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>The LSE is penciling in annual combined revenue of more than 6 billion pounds.</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out: </strong>Exchange groups around the world have found themselves inching toward consolidation as stock and bond trading becomes <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/london-stock-exchange-eyes-27-billion-bet-for-blackstones-refinitiv-11564222109?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">increasingly electronic</a> (and profits from more traditional business fall). To keep up, groups like the LSE need faster data sources...which they can also conveniently charge clients more for.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Today, information services account for almost 40% of the LSE’s roughly $2.7 billion in annual revenue. Post-trade services account for a little over one-third. And traditional capital markets like stock trading and IPOs? 19% of revenue last year, compared with 46% a decade ago.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Worth keeping in mind: </strong>We’d be willing to bet our tea and crumpets there will be a long <a href="https://www.reuters.com/article/us-refinitiv-m-a-lse/lse-refinitiv-deal-faces-long-antitrust-review-sources-idUSKCN1UN0O4?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">antitrust review</a> before this deal closes.</p>

<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
MARKETS
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/07/29/investors-piling-onto-trades?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Stock Market Déjà Vu
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">“Everyone had the same idea, huh?” isn’t just a saying for dads when there’s a 20-minute wait at Chili’s.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">As stocks push to new highs, everyone is piling into the same trades at record levels, <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/with-stocks-at-fresh-highs-investors-portfolios-look-alike-11564306201?mod=hp_lead_pos5&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">per the WSJ</a>. Among this season’s hottest? Mastercard, Microsoft, Amazon, PayPal...and plenty of other tech names.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">What they have that others don’t: </strong>Momentum. Stocks that rose the fastest last year are valued almost 25% higher than normal relative to their next 12 months of earnings, according to Bank of America data. And the valuation gap between growth and value stocks is at a record, per DWS Group.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">But you know what they say about bright stars. </strong>One bum earnings report from one of those widely held stocks could have an outsized impact on the broader market when everyone's holding it. Don’t forget that Nasdaq correction in May thanks mostly to a few Big Tech firms that got bent out of shape.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Bottom line: </strong>In year 10 of this economic expansion, being original isn’t exactly a priority. Investors are hesitant to end the good thing they’ve got going—especially as global growth starts to sputter.</p>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
PHARMA
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/07/29/pfizer-mylan-nearing-merger-deal-fend-off-generic-competition?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Pfizer and Mylan Believe in Safety in Numbers
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Pfizer is <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/pfizer-nears-deal-to-combine-off-patent-drug-business-with-mylan-11564228743?mod=hp_lead_pos1&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">reportedly</a> in talks to divest its off-patent business and merge it with Mylan to pform a pformidable generic drug seller, per the WSJ. When the Brew went to e-print, no deal had been finalized, but one could be announced as early as today. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">What’s in it for Pfizer: </strong>Combining its portfolio with Mylan’s products and IP will help Pfizer stay competitive against lower-priced rivals and (hopefully) give sales a much-needed boost. Already, newcomers are gunning to unseat Pfizer’s market-leading off-patent Lipitor cholesterol pills and Viagra...Viagra.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Mylan’s play is pretty similar. </strong>The EpiPen producer has struggled to compete in an increasingly hostile generic drugs market. It’s worth about $9.5 billion and holds over $13 billion in long-term debt. Shares are down almost 50% in the past year, while its public image is down even more given its involvement in a civil <a href="https://www.ft.com/content/4688a0ea-7586-11e9-be7d-6d846537acab?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">price-fixing suit</a>.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">+ The timing is worth noting.</strong> Pfizer <a href="https://news.alphastreet.com/earnings-preview-a-look-at-key-factors-affecting-pfizers-q2-results/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">reports earnings tomorrow</a>, and Mylan’s got <a href="http://investor.mylan.com/investor-relations?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">an investor day</a> planned Wednesday. Nothing keeps analysts' attention like a big, pfat <a href="https://finance.yahoo.com/news/pfizer-nears-deal-combine-off-124839047.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">merger</a>.</p>

<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
GAMING
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/07/29/fortnite-world-cup-shows-cracks-battle-royale-business?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Fortnite Needs a Viewership Respawn
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The first-ever Fortnite World Cup <a href="https://www.theverge.com/2019/7/25/20708650/fortnite-world-cup-preview-streaming-twitch-youtube-esports?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">sold out</a> NYC's 23,000-seat Arthur Ashe Stadium (which also hosts the U.S. Open) this weekend. Imagine a tennis tournament—but replace two 30-year olds furiously pounding yellow balls with 100 16-year-olds furiously <a href="https://www.forbes.com/sites/mattperez/2019/07/26/fortnite-world-cup-by-the-numbers/?utm_source=morning_brew#1a8747c46be0?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">pounding keyboards</a>. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Some numbers to make you question higher education over joystick skills...</strong></p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>$30 million in prize money was distributed, with $3 million going to each winner of the solo and duo competitions. When Tiger Woods won the Masters in the spring, he took home $2 million.</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>40 million players </span><span><a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2019/07/28/sports/fortnite-world-cup.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">participated</a></span><span> in online qualifiers, with $50,000 guaranteed for every qualifier.</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">But...viewership is in quicksand. </strong>A much-hyped monster fight on Saturday <a href="https://www.forbes.com/sites/paultassi/2019/07/22/fortnites-world-events-are-getting-bigger-while-viewership-is-getting-smaller/?utm_source=morning_brew#a41bcf543ac9?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">didn’t even make it</a> into the top 10 most-watched Fortnite events by Twitch viewership. The 2018 Celebrity Pro-Am is No. 1 on that list with 1.5 million concurrent viewers. This year, viewership of that matchup tanked 73% when it kicked off the World Cup on Friday.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Bottom line: </strong>Nothing lasts forever, including Fortnite’s mega-popularity. But the battle royale game has still turned its publisher, Epic Games, into an industry juggernaut.</p>

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
CALENDAR
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/07/29/week-ahead-economics-earnings?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
The Week Ahead
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>

</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Stock up on the Salonpas heading into this week. All your coworkers who spent the weekend flossing through that Fortnite World Cup are going to need it.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Monday: </strong>U.S. Trade Representative Robert Lighthizer and Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin travel to China for trade talks; President Trump to sign 9/11 Victim Compensation Fund bill into law; earnings (Beyond Meat, Sanofi)</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Tuesday: </strong>Fed meeting begins; June core inflation and consumer spending stats released; earnings (Apple, Allstate, Procter & Gamble, Eli Lilly, Grubhub, Merck, Under Armour); Democratic primary debate night one</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Wednesday:</strong> Fed announces its decision on rates (and Chair Jerome Powell holds a press conference); earnings (Fiat Chrysler, Fitbit, GE, Moody’s, Spotify); MLB trade deadline; Democratic primary debate night two</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Thursday: </strong>ISM manufacturing; construction spending; earnings (Pinterest, Dunkin’ Brands, Crocs, Etsy, GoPro, GM, Kellogg, Shell, Square, Verizon); Summer X Games begin</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Friday: </strong>July jobs report; trade deficit; consumer sentiment; earnings (Berkshire Hathaway, Chevron, Exxon, Restaurant Brands)</p>

Refinitiv\n\u003c/font\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\n\u003c/h1\u003e\n\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/table\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThe London Stock Exchange (LSE, but not the one where your econ major friends studied one summer in college) confirmed it’s in \u003ca href=\"https://www.ft.com/content/ddf40314-afc6-11e9-8030-530adfa879c2?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eadvanced talks\u003c/a\u003e to buy Refinitiv in a $27 billion \u003ca href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2019-07-26/lse-is-discussing-combination-with-data-firm-refinitiv-ft-says?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003edeal\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eRefinitiv, which is majority-owned by a consortium including U.S. private equity giant Blackstone, provides companies with global financial data analytics. That's a fancy British way of saying it sends 40,000+ traders and investors the pre-crunched numbers they need to do their jobs. Looking for a \u003cGO\u003e button? Refinitiv’s Eikon terminals are the main alternative to Bloomberg Terminals on most trading floors.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eThe LSE knows data wins arguments\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eIt might have earned its reputation running stock exchanges and clearing derivatives, but the LSE has large-scale \u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/us-refinitiv-m-a-lse-exchange-analysis/lses-bid-for-refinitiv-spotlights-quest-for-data-globality-idUSKCN1UN048?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003edata ambitions\u003c/a\u003e, too.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eAlready, it runs Mergent, a private company information service; XTF, an information service for exchange-traded funds; and The Yield Book, a fixed-income indexing service. Adding Refinitiv to the roster gives the LSE firmer data footing while diversifying its revenue streams.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eRefinitiv was valued at $20 billion last year.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThe LSE is penciling in annual combined revenue of more than 6 billion pounds.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out: \u003c/strong\u003eExchange groups around the world have found themselves inching toward consolidation as stock and bond trading becomes \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/london-stock-exchange-eyes-27-billion-bet-for-blackstones-refinitiv-11564222109?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eincreasingly electronic\u003c/a\u003e (and profits from more traditional business fall). To keep up, groups like the LSE need faster data sources...which they can also conveniently charge clients more for.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eToday, information services account for almost 40% of the LSE’s roughly $2.7 billion in annual revenue. Post-trade services account for a little over one-third. And traditional capital markets like stock trading and IPOs? 19% of revenue last year, compared with 46% a decade ago.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eWorth keeping in mind: \u003c/strong\u003eWe’d be willing to bet our tea and crumpets there will be a long \u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/us-refinitiv-m-a-lse/lse-refinitiv-deal-faces-long-antitrust-review-sources-idUSKCN1UN0O4?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eantitrust review\u003c/a\u003e before this deal closes.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e“Everyone had the same idea, huh?” isn’t just a saying for dads when there’s a 20-minute wait at Chili’s.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eAs stocks push to new highs, everyone is piling into the same trades at record levels, \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/with-stocks-at-fresh-highs-investors-portfolios-look-alike-11564306201?mod=hp_lead_pos5\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eper the WSJ\u003c/a\u003e. Among this season’s hottest? Mastercard, Microsoft, Amazon, PayPal...and plenty of other tech names.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eWhat they have that others don’t: \u003c/strong\u003eMomentum. Stocks that rose the fastest last year are valued almost 25% higher than normal relative to their next 12 months of earnings, according to Bank of America data. And the valuation gap between growth and value stocks is at a record, per DWS Group.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBut you know what they say about bright stars. \u003c/strong\u003eOne bum earnings report from one of those widely held stocks could have an outsized impact on the broader market when everyone's holding it. Don’t forget that Nasdaq correction in May thanks mostly to a few Big Tech firms that got bent out of shape.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBottom line: \u003c/strong\u003eIn year 10 of this economic expansion, being original isn’t exactly a priority. style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThe first-ever Fortnite World Cup \u003ca href=\"https://www.theverge.com/2019/7/25/20708650/fortnite-world-cup-preview-streaming-twitch-youtube-esports?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003esold out\u003c/a\u003e NYC's 23,000-seat Arthur Ashe Stadium (which also hosts the U.S. Open) this weekend. Imagine a tennis tournament—but replace two 30-year olds furiously pounding yellow balls with 100 16-year-olds furiously \u003ca href=\"https://www.forbes.com/sites/mattperez/2019/07/26/fortnite-world-cup-by-the-numbers/?utm_source=morning_brew#1a8747c46be0?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003epounding keyboards\u003c/a\u003e. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eSome numbers to make you question higher education over joystick skills...\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003e$30 million in prize money was distributed, with $3 million going to each winner of the solo and duo competitions. When Tiger Woods won the Masters in the spring, he took home $2 million.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e40 million players \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2019/07/28/sports/fortnite-world-cup.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eparticipated\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e in online qualifiers, with $50,000 guaranteed for every qualifier.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBut...viewership is in quicksand. \u003c/strong\u003eA much-hyped monster fight on Saturday \u003ca href=\"https://www.forbes.com/sites/paultassi/2019/07/22/fortnites-world-events-are-getting-bigger-while-viewership-is-getting-smaller/?utm_source=morning_brew#a41bcf543ac9?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003edidn’t even make it\u003c/a\u003e into the top 10 most-watched Fortnite events by Twitch viewership. The 2018 Celebrity Pro-Am is No. 1 on that list with 1.5 million concurrent viewers. This year, viewership of that matchup tanked 73% when it kicked off the World Cup on Friday.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBottom line: \u003c/strong\u003eNothing lasts forever, including Fortnite’s mega-popularity.
